statements: DELETE FROM plants WHERE plant_type = 'Flower' AND growth_stage > 2;
DELETE FROM plants WHERE growth_stage > 3 AND health_status = 'Good';
DELETE FROM farm_crops WHERE growth_status = 'Ready' AND health_notes = 'No issues';
DELETE FROM plants WHERE growth_stage = 'Mature' AND health_status = 'Good';
DELETE FROM GrowthData WHERE height > 100 AND width < 50;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date < '2021-10-01' AND maintenance_type = 'Pruning';
